title: Infowars Bankruptcy Delays Upcoming Sandy Hook Trial
sub_head: A trial scheduled to begin next week to establish damages against Alex Jones was postponed after some of his media businesses filed chapter 11 earlier this week
body:
Lawyers representing Sandy Hook families are accusing conspiracy theorist Alex Jones of placing his Infowars website into bankruptcy as a last-ditch effort to avoid an upcoming trial to establish damages for falsely claiming the 2012 shooting was a hoax.
“This was their only avenue to stop this trial from happening,” Cordt Akers, a lawyer representing some of the families, told The Wall Street Journal on Wednesday after a state judge in Austin, Texas, postponed the trial that was set to begin next week.
